body:
Hi,

Since an official hasn't made an official thread about registration, I will. (This will probs get locked but oh well)

I just wanted to say that REGISTRATION IS OPEN! You can register your team here! Remember, you need 12 players to register and the max is 18.
 
Bye,
nintendoboy11 o/

title: Registration is Open!
